post.body: Poor you! Although rata is very good.... Risotto waslurvely this evening btw...
it is very cold here, forgot to shut the window.... :(
as always.... :P
I managed to get up allright, Today should be fun! Only three and a half hours sleep is not good at all!
I agree, I don't remember anything to do with proR hydrogens anywhere! Well Igot what I predicted myself! Huzzah! Morning Everyone!
Iwas singing along.. If you didn't hear!
not fair, I wanted some of those...
that is just a nasty thing to do
I know, but you actually did.... Got the complete Boosh on DVD btw...
Don't revise It is christmas!
Not Fair, I could mock your french pronounciation, but I don't know how bad it is... haha D:
No i butchered it with my dodgy germanic pronunciation.....
wants to go back
is at home, and hates sainsburys already.... his rom is now his rather than a shell with his borthers stuff in it, and is full of NIN
can't tweet any time but now today..... he will miss uni and all of his lovely friends but not so much the Jazz Whale and Mrs Flaky.... :D
tidied his room and is now 75% packed for home.... and listening to Blackwater Park very loudly.... Take that Jazzwhale.... :P
is going to sleep on his first free afternoon in a long time!
finished the write up, handed in his nepenthes distiallatoira and wants another plant for his room
is back at the Geester to do BS1002 Write up, having sucessfully put it off this far....
loves the fact he doesn't have to be in uni until ten!
is back at Mary Gee in preparation for a lovely evening of relaxing revision....?!?
just saw someone get owned by the quiet patrol.... Hahaha.... '
is now one of many biologists cramming avant cette apres midi
is the only person on floor one of DW in the yellow bit.... I feel lonely!
just watched Stop making Sense!
has stopped revising....
made a wonderful lunch but unfortunately has a house full of sick siblings... They have the lurgie!
is awake again, and thinks @uolpl83's purchase is interesting... For what purpose I wonder....? Do they have magic powers?
had an interesting first night at Sainsburys, it was like the night of the living dead, after napping, Ben is starting to look at revision.
just played his guitar and likes the ampat home a little more now he has reorganised his effects loop.... Next purchase is an MD2 distortion
prefers his hair au naturelle :P, but really wants to have more sleep in preparation for the night shift tonight....
is finally free from the carol concert hell, dear lord if it lasted any longer, I may have gnawed my leg off
had an interesting day helping out with the seemingly Les Dawson arranged carol concert rehersal, may Bob save us all....
is still faithfully tweeting this evening.... But notices that noone else is!
is back from Robs house where he played much call of duty.... too much!
is going to see some of his home friends.... no way near as good as Uni mates though.... :( Lurvely Sooop!
is dreading the sanesbreeze shift.... I just want the guitar now damn it! Why do i have to wait to get paid..... Only three days
is trying to hide from cousins playing with a hyperactive puppy... It is a bad thing. Party was good last night, got very pissled.. :P
is sorry he didn't tweet yesterday.... But today he is revising and watching Amelie....
feels rough. Not enough sleep and stacking toilet roll and shampoo does that to a man
is having pasta bake before Sainsburys! wooohaaa! =-__-=
wants a hug.
was asleep on his bed, in prepration for the shift this evening.... But is now awake
is rocking out to Riverside in the kitchen to the work of BS1012.... @uolpl83 That was really difficult to do!
ruined the song!
also got back from walking the doggie, saw another uberchristmas house. @uolpl83 It is coming to uni, for sharing! Not Turkish delight!
likes christmas.... Presents and hperactive puppies! @uolp83 when isn't it :P?
is frenzied typing again!
has listened to a Pain of Salvation life Album.... It is amazing
has returned from social awkwardness once again!
